PlatformWatch | Full Stack Developer | NYC | $80-110K + equity + benefits | Full-time, ONSITE |

I’m one of the co-founders at PlatformWatch (https://www.platformwatch.com/). We’re building a platform that will change the entire software procurement lifecycle; including how you discover, purchase, manage and optimize SaaS applications.

We’re a two person team based in NYC and are hiring our first full-time developer. The ideal candidate has enterprise SaaS development experience has managed a team and is excited to work on building many different products leveraging large data sets.

Email shlomo@platformwatch.com if you’re interested and want to know more
